CustomField.formula:
NOT(History_List_View__c) &&
Quarter_End_Date__c < TODAY() && OR( (RecordType.Name == "Household" && INCLUDES(Account__r.Producer_Contract_Obligation_Types__c, "Household")), (RecordType.Name == "Non-Household" && INCLUDES(Account__r.Producer_Contract_Obligation_Types__c, "Non-Household")), (RecordType.Name == "Household & Non-Household" && INCLUDES(Account__r.Producer_Contract_Obligation_Types__c, "Household & Non-Household")) )
CustomField.label: Quarter_End_Date__c
